name: Frying pan, Lobb's Golden Poppy
overview: It is a small annual herb that is drought resistant. It must be exposed to sun. This plant is attractive to bees, butterflies and/birds. Blooms late spring to early fall.
habitat: It is endemic to California: mostly seen along foothills however, also grows in the Central valley as well as within the Sierra Nevada foothills.
tags: Bright Yellow orange spot Yellow Poppy Plants plant
